alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 1:38AM MST until February 26 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 2 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Localized gusts as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 2 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibilities making road travel hazardous. Highways 60, 77, and 87 affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
